Body:
"""
    Test of the fiscla.get_G_ss() function.
    """
Y = 2.2
net_revenue = 2.3
pension_amount = 0.0
TR = 1.6
new_borrowing = 0.072076633
debt_service = 0.042345192
p = Specifications()
p.budget_balance = budget_balance
test_G = fiscal.get_G_ss(Y, net_revenue, pension_amount, TR, new_borrowing,
    debt_service, p)
assert np.allclose(test_G, expected_G)
pytest.mark.parametrize('budget_balance,expected_G', [(False, expected_G1),
    (True, expected_G2)], ids=['balanced_budget = False',
    'balanced_budget = True'])
